name: §a§nLost Methods I
description: Merlings have learned how to make the most out of their aquatic environment and tools available to them.

text: In your free time, you like to fish and as a result from all that fishing, you've become an expert at fishing.
You have passive §aLuck of the Sea I§r.
Merlings are able to dig up buried Nautilus Shells from the Oceans.
You have a §a1%§r chance of getting a Nautilus Shell instead of the actual block drop when mining sand or gravel and while submerged in water.
This also applies to live coral blocks but instead you have a §a3%§r chance of getting a Nautilus Shell.
Merlings are able to utilize a Conduit even outside of water due to their secret knowledge and methods.
You gain the §aConduit Power§r effect even when outside of water.
